name: @akashic/akashic-cli
description: Command-line utility for akashic game development

scripts.test: npm run lint:md && lerna run test
scripts.publish:patch: node build/updateChangelog.js patch && npm run commit-changelog && lerna publish patch --yes
scripts.publish:minor: node build/updateChangelog.js minor && npm run commit-changelog && lerna publish minor --yes
scripts.publish:major: node build/updateChangelog.js major && npm run commit-changelog && lerna publish major --yes
scripts.republish: node build/updateChangelog.js patch && npm run commit-changelog && lerna publish --force-publish=* patch --yes

author: DWANGO Co., Ltd.
